meta.notes: SunStyle Retail NetSuite implementation requirements dataset. Includes 62 requirements extracted from business documentation, technical specifications, and customer interviews.

requirements.title: Multi-Location Inventory Management
requirements.description: System shall manage inventory across multiple warehouse locations including Mesquite, TX and Livonia, GA.

provenance.sourceRef: UYB Meeting Notes - Inventory and Assembly Process Review

sourceLocator.quote: We have two warehouses: Mesquite and Livonia. We need NetSuite to show what's where and to move stock between them.

followUpQuestions: Do you need bin-level tracking within each warehouse?
What is the transfer order process between locations?
Are there location-specific costs or pricing rules?
How should fulfillment location be determined (closest, primary, manual)?
Are any locations third-party logistics (3PL)?
This is a question add.

steps: Configure Mesquite, TX and Livonia, GA as inventory locations
Set up Transfer Order process for inter-location moves
Configure location assignment rules on sales orders

solutionOptions.title: Native locations + Transfer Orders
solutionOptions.description: Use standard NetSuite inventory locations with Transfer Orders for inter-location moves; optionally use allocation rules for fulfillment location selection.
cons: May require process discipline for transfers
risks: If users bypass transfers, on-hand by location will drift

decision.rationale: Baseline option pending confirmation of bin requirements.

followUpQuestions: Do you require wave picking or directed picking?
Do you need location-specific reorder points?
references: Internal: UYB Inventory SOP draft v0.3

solutionOptions.title: Locations + 3PL as virtual location
solutionOptions.description: Represent the 3PL as a virtual location and use transfer/ownership process controls to track stock at the provider.
cons: Virtual location can hide operational nuance

edges.note: Website inventory sync needs location-level ATP.
Assemblies occur at specific locations.
Consignment may be tracked as a virtual location.

requirements.title: E-commerce Inventory Availability Sync
requirements.description: System shall expose real-time or near-real-time inventory availability to the e-commerce storefront by location and overall.

sourceLocator.quote: If the website says it's in stock and then we can't fulfill, it blows up CS. We need accurate availability—ideally by warehouse.

followUpQuestions: Which storefront platform(s) are in scope?
Do you need location-level availability on the product page?
What is the acceptable latency (seconds, minutes, hourly)?
Should backorders be allowed when availability is zero?
Are there allocation or reservation rules to apply?

steps: Define availability rules (ATP vs. on-hand vs. available-to-promise)
Select integration pattern (webhooks, scheduled sync, middleware)
Map item identifiers and location identifiers

solutionOptions.title: Middleware-driven near-real-time sync
solutionOptions.description: Use middleware to consume NetSuite item/location availability changes and push updates to storefront APIs.

decision.rationale: Need monitoring and retries; internal team already runs middleware.

solutionOptions.title: Scheduled availability export (batch)
solutionOptions.description: Export availability to SFTP/HTTP feed every N minutes; storefront ingests feed.

implementation.notes: Availability computed as On Hand - Committed; pushed to storefront every 60s with retries + dead-letter queue.

edges.note: Location-level inventory must exist before syncing.

requirements.title: Vendor Bill Approval Controls
requirements.description: System shall support approval of vendor bills prior to posting/payment based on amount thresholds and approver roles.

sourceLocator.quote: We need approval on vendor bills over $5k, and some invoices need 2 people to sign off.

followUpQuestions: What are the approval thresholds (by amount, vendor, subsidiary, department)?
Do approvals need to be sequential or can they be concurrent?
Do you need delegation, out-of-office rules, or reassignments?
Should approvals be required before GL impact or only before payment?
Do approvers need visibility into supporting documents?

steps: Select approval mechanism (custom fields, SuiteFlow workflow, custom records + script)

solutionOptions.title: Custom fields + task queue
solutionOptions.description: Add custom approval status/approver fields and route approvals through a controlled task queue (e.g., custom record or task assignments).

solutionOptions.title: SuiteFlow multi-stage workflow with concurrent approvers
solutionOptions.description: Use a workflow to manage states (Pending, Approved, Rejected) with parallel approvals and threshold-based routing.
cons: Complex parallel logic can get hard to reason about

solutionOptions.title: Custom approval metadata records
solutionOptions.description: Create custom records to store approval routing rules and history; use script to evaluate and update transactions.

edges.note: Approval notifications may use the email template standards.

requirements.title: Assembly Build at Specific Locations
requirements.description: System shall support assembly builds occurring at designated locations and consuming components from that location's inventory.

provenance.sourceRef: UYB Meeting Notes - Inventory and Assembly Process Review

sourceLocator.quote: We assemble kits in Mesquite, but sometimes Livonia does small runs. Components should come from the right warehouse.

followUpQuestions: Do you require work orders or simple assembly builds?
Do you need labor/overhead costing captured?
Are builds backflushed or manually issued?
Do you need build-to-order on sales orders?
designProposal: Confirm assembly item list and component BOM accuracy
Train operations on build transactions and reversals

edges.note: Assembly build requires location inventory accuracy.
Availability sync must account for assemblies at each location.

requirements.title: Role-Based Access for Inventory Transactions
requirements.description: System shall restrict inventory adjustments and transfers to authorized roles and maintain an audit trail of changes.

sourceLocator.quote: Inventory adjustments must be limited to supervisors; all changes must be auditable.

followUpQuestions: Which roles can create adjustments vs. approve adjustments?
Are there segregation-of-duties constraints (create vs. post)?
Do you need alerts for high-value adjustments?

steps: Define least-privilege roles for adjustments, transfers, and receipts
Create saved searches for adjustment monitoring

solutionOptions.title: Native permissions + monitoring searches
solutionOptions.description: Use NetSuite roles/permissions and enable monitoring via saved searches and system notes.
cons: Alerts may require additional scripting or workflow

implementation.notes: Created Inventory Supervisor role; restricted Inventory Adjustment and Transfer Order permissions; deployed monitoring saved searches.

edges.note: Location processes must align with role controls.

requirements.title: Standardized Email Templates for Operational Notifications
requirements.description: System shall use standardized email templates for approvals, shipment notices, and exception alerts.

sourceLocator.quote: Consistent emails reduce confusion. We want standard templates for key operational messages.

followUpQuestions: Which events need notifications (approvals, fulfillment, billing, exceptions)?
Who are recipients (internal, customer, vendor)?
Do templates need branding per subsidiary?

solutionOptions.title: Central template catalog + governance
solutionOptions.description: Maintain a controlled set of templates and require change review before edits.

decision.rationale: Replaced by customer's corporate comms system standard.

edges.note: Approval notifications should follow template standards.
Incident alerts may share template components.

requirements.title: Near-Zero Downtime Cutover Plan
requirements.description: Project shall deliver a cutover plan that minimizes operational downtime to under 4 hours during go-live weekend.

sourceLocator.quote: We can't stop shipping for a full day. Plan for a cutover that keeps downtime under four hours.

followUpQuestions: What is the shipping blackout window that is acceptable?
Are there integrations that can lag behind cutover?
Do you need parallel run for financials?
designProposal: Define freeze windows per function (AP, AR, shipping, purchasing)
Execute mock cutovers and measure duration
Create rollback plan and data reconciliation checklist

edges.note: Data migration sequence impacts cutover timeline.

requirements.title: Historical Transaction Migration Scope
requirements.description: System shall migrate 24 months of historical transactions for reporting, including orders, fulfillments, invoices, and payments.

sourceLocator.quote: We don't need 10 years, but we want two years of transactions in NetSuite so reports don't look empty.

followUpQuestions: Which transaction types are required (SO, IF, INV, CM, PAY)?
Is the requirement for analytics only or operational drill-through?
What are acceptable data quality thresholds and reconciliation rules?
Do you require source-system document images migrated?

steps: Confirm transaction scope and cutover date
Build migration pipelines and reconciliation reports

solutionOptions.title: Full operational migration (24 months)
solutionOptions.description: Load full transactions with links (SO→IF→INV→PAY) to support drill-down and operational queries.

solutionOptions.title: Summarized historical GL + open transactions only
solutionOptions.description: Load summarized GL balances and only open operational transactions; keep historical operational detail in a reporting warehouse.

edges.note: Migration plan and duration directly affect cutover downtime.
Migration monitoring may generate incident alerts.

requirements.title: Consignment Stock Visibility
requirements.description: System shall track consigned inventory separately from owned inventory and report consignment balances by location.

provenance.sourceRef: UYB Meeting Notes - Inventory and Assembly Process Review

sourceLocator.quote: We might do consignment in the future, but it's not in the next six months.

followUpQuestions: Is consignment currently active or future-state only?
Do you need ownership tracking at the lot/serial level?
How will settlement and billing work for consigned goods?

steps: Defer until consignment program is approved by business

solutionOptions.title: Virtual location for consignment
solutionOptions.description: Model consignment as a separate location and use process controls to prevent commingling with owned stock.

edges.note: Consignment would likely be modeled as an additional location.

requirements.title: Automated Incident Alerts for Integration Failures
requirements.description: System shall notify IT within 5 minutes of integration failures and provide a diagnostic payload for triage.

sourceLocator.quote: We require alerts for failed jobs within 5 minutes and want the payload/stack trace attached or linkable.

followUpQuestions: What alert channels are required (email, SMS, Slack, PagerDuty)?
What constitutes a failure (HTTP 5xx, retries exhausted, schema mismatch)?
Do you need correlation IDs to trace across systems?
What is the on-call schedule and escalation policy?

steps: Define failure conditions and alert routing
Add correlation IDs and link to logs

solutionOptions.title: PagerDuty + structured event payload
solutionOptions.description: Publish failures to PagerDuty with structured details and a link to the raw payload in the error store.

implementation.notes: Alert dispatcher posts to PagerDuty; error store retains last 30 days; correlation IDs included.

edges.note: Alerts must be wired into the chosen integration approach.
Alerts may share standardized template components.

requirements.title: Single Customer View Across All Touchpoints
requirements.description: System shall provide unified customer profile visibility across retail stores, e-commerce, and mobile channels, supporting omnichannel customer management.
followUpQuestions: What specific customer data attributes must be shared across channels?
Are there privacy or consent considerations for cross-channel data sharing?
How should conflicting customer data between channels be resolved?

requirements.title: Real-time Inventory Availability Checks
requirements.description: System shall provide real-time inventory availability checks to support order placement across all sales channels.
followUpQuestions: What is the acceptable latency for availability checks (milliseconds, seconds)?
How should reserved inventory for fraud review orders be handled in availability calculations?
Should availability checks consider pending inbound stock?

edges.note: Need integration plan for reserved inventory calculations in fraud review status vs. real-time availability.

requirements.title: Automated Reorder Point Calculations
requirements.description: System shall calculate reorder points automatically and generate purchase orders for inventory replenishment based on configurable rules.
followUpQuestions: What factors should drive reorder point calculations (lead time, sales velocity, seasonality)?
Should reorder points vary by location?
What approval process is needed for auto-generated purchase orders?

requirements.title: Offline Mode for POS System
requirements.description: System shall maintain point-of-sale transaction capability when network connectivity is lost, with automatic synchronization upon reconnection.
followUpQuestions: What is the maximum acceptable offline duration?
How should payment processing work in offline mode?
What conflict resolution rules are needed for inventory when syncing offline transactions?

requirements.title: Virtual Try-on Using AR Technology
requirements.description: System shall support augmented reality virtual try-on capability for sunglasses and eyewear products on the e-commerce platform.
followUpQuestions: What AR platform or SDK should be used?
Are there specific device/browser compatibility requirements?
Should AR try-on data be stored in NetSuite or an external system?

requirements.title: Flexible Promotional Engine
requirements.description: System shall support multiple promotion types including percentage discounts, dollar-off, BOGO, tiered pricing, coupon management, and customer segmentation.
followUpQuestions: What promotion stacking rules should be enforced?
How should promotion conflicts be resolved?
Are there channel-specific promotions (online only, in-store only)?

requirements.title: Real-time Reporting and Analytics
requirements.description: System shall provide real-time reporting and analytics with data refresh less than 5 minutes and a custom report builder for business users.
followUpQuestions: What are the top 10 critical reports needed?
Should analytics be built in NetSuite or a separate BI tool?
What user roles need report building capability?

requirements.title: Sales Commission Calculation
requirements.description: System shall automatically calculate and track sales commissions for store employees based on configurable commission rules.
followUpQuestions: What events trigger commission (sale, fulfillment, payment)?
How are returns and exchanges handled?
Are there tiered commission rates or team-based splits?

requirements.title: Automated Vendor Reordering
requirements.description: System shall support automated vendor reordering processes integrated with vendor management and purchase order workflows.
followUpQuestions: Which vendors support automated ordering (EDI, API, email)?
What approval thresholds are needed for auto-generated POs?
How should minimum order quantities and case packs be handled?

requirements.title: Multi-channel Customer Support
requirements.description: System shall support customer service interactions across phone, email, chat, and social media channels with intelligent ticket routing.
followUpQuestions: What case management system will be used (native NetSuite or third-party)?
What SLAs are required for different support tiers?
How should social media interactions be captured and tracked?

requirements.title: Multi-region Deployment for High Availability
requirements.description: System shall deploy across multiple cloud regions (primary: us-west1, secondary: us-east1) with automatic failover capability under 60 seconds.
followUpQuestions: Is NetSuite's native high availability sufficient or is additional infrastructure required?
What is the RPO/RTO target?
How should data residency requirements be addressed?

requirements.title: Database Encryption at Rest and in Transit
requirements.description: System shall encrypt all data at rest using AES-256 and all data in transit using TLS 1.3 or higher.

provenance.sourceRef: Technical Requirements AR-002.4, Security Requirements SR-002

followUpQuestions: Are there specific key management requirements?
Is NetSuite's native encryption sufficient or are additional controls needed?
What encryption standards are required for integrations?

requirements.title: API Rate Limiting Enforcement
requirements.description: System shall enforce API rate limits of 1000 requests per minute per client to protect system performance and availability.
followUpQuestions: Should rate limits vary by client type or integration?
What response should be provided when limits are exceeded?
Are there burst allowances for specific use cases?

requirements.title: Web Application Performance Targets
requirements.description: System shall meet performance targets: page load under 2 seconds, time to interactive under 3 seconds, Google Lighthouse score above 90.
followUpQuestions: Are these targets for all pages or specific high-traffic pages?
What network conditions should be tested (3G, 4G, WiFi)?
How should performance be monitored in production?

requirements.title: Multi-factor Authentication for Admin Users
requirements.description: System shall require multi-factor authentication for all users with privileged administrative access.
followUpQuestions: What MFA methods are acceptable (SMS, authenticator app, hardware token)?
Should MFA be required for all roles or specific privileges?
What is the MFA bypass/recovery process?

requirements.title: PCI-DSS Compliance
requirements.description: System shall comply with PCI-DSS requirements including payment card data tokenization and prohibition of full PAN storage.
followUpQuestions: What payment processors are in scope?
Is PCI compliance required for NetSuite or handled by payment gateway?
What is the target compliance level (Level 1-4)?

requirements.title: OWASP Top 10 Vulnerability Protection
requirements.description: System shall implement protections against OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities including input validation, XSS prevention, SQL injection prevention, and CSRF protection.
followUpQuestions: What security testing tools and processes will be used?
How frequently should security scans be performed?
What is the vulnerability remediation SLA?

requirements.title: GDPR and CCPA Compliance
requirements.description: System shall comply with GDPR and CCPA requirements including right to erasure, data portability, and consent management.
followUpQuestions: What customer data must be included in portability exports?
How should data deletion requests be processed across integrated systems?
What consent tracking and audit trail is required?

requirements.title: 99.9% System Uptime SLA
requirements.description: System shall maintain 99.9% uptime SLA with maximum 8.76 hours of downtime per year.
followUpQuestions: Does this SLA apply to all systems or specific components?
How is planned maintenance handled in uptime calculations?
What penalties or remediation apply for SLA breaches?

requirements.title: Disaster Recovery Targets
requirements.description: System shall meet disaster recovery targets: RTO of 4 hours, RPO of 1 hour, with geo-redundant backups.
followUpQuestions: How frequently should DR testing occur?
What systems are in scope for DR (NetSuite only or all integrations)?
What is the backup retention policy?

requirements.title: Real-time Monitoring and Alerting
requirements.description: System shall provide real-time monitoring with application performance monitoring, infrastructure monitoring, mean time to detect under 5 minutes, and mean time to repair under 30 minutes.
followUpQuestions: What monitoring tools will be used (Datadog, New Relic, native NetSuite)?
What specific metrics should trigger alerts?
Who is the on-call team and what is the escalation policy?

requirements.title: Message Queue for Asynchronous Processing
requirements.description: System shall implement message queue infrastructure (Cloud Pub/Sub or equivalent) with throughput capacity exceeding 10,000 messages per second.
followUpQuestions: What use cases require message queuing?
What message ordering and exactly-once delivery guarantees are needed?
How should dead letter queues and retry policies be configured?

requirements.title: Audit Logging for Critical Operations
requirements.description: System shall maintain comprehensive audit logs for authentication events, data access, configuration changes, and security events.
followUpQuestions: What is the audit log retention period?
Should audit logs be stored in NetSuite or a separate SIEM?
What specific events must be audited for compliance?

requirements.title: Customer Profile Merging and Duplicate Detection
requirements.description: System shall detect duplicate customer profiles and support merging with conflict resolution workflows.
followUpQuestions: What matching rules should be used for duplicate detection?
Should duplicate detection be automatic or manual?
How should transaction history be handled during merge?

requirements.title: Loyalty Program with Tier Management
requirements.description: System shall support loyalty program with points accrual (1 point per $1 spent), tier tracking (Silver/Gold/Platinum), and 24-month expiration.
followUpQuestions: How should points be earned on returns/exchanges?
Are there tier-specific benefits or pricing?
How should points redemption work across channels?

requirements.title: Prescription Order Verification Workflow
requirements.description: System shall support prescription order workflow including upload, optometrist approval, and verification within 4 hours.
followUpQuestions: What format should prescriptions be uploaded (image, PDF, structured data)?
How should rejected prescriptions be handled?
What system stores the verified prescription data?

requirements.title: Fraud Detection Screening for Orders
requirements.description: System shall implement fraud detection screening to flag high-risk orders during order validation workflow.
followUpQuestions: What fraud signals should be evaluated?
Should fraud screening be real-time or asynchronous?
What is the review process for flagged orders?

edges.note: This requirement relates to the native e-commerce fraud detection system detailed in REQ-052.

requirements.title: Intelligent Fulfillment Routing
requirements.description: System shall determine optimal fulfillment location based on inventory availability, shipping cost, and delivery time.
followUpQuestions: What is the priority order for routing factors (cost vs. speed)?
Should routing support split shipments?
Can fulfillment location be manually overridden?

requirements.title: Real-time Order Status Tracking with Multi-channel Notifications
requirements.description: System shall provide real-time order status tracking with email, SMS, and push notifications with status lag under 5 minutes.
followUpQuestions: What order milestones trigger notifications?
Should notification preferences be customer-configurable?
What notification platform will be used?

requirements.title: Self-service Return Portal with RMA
requirements.description: System shall provide self-service return portal with 30-day return window, prepaid shipping labels, and refund processing within 3 business days.
followUpQuestions: What return reasons should be captured?
How should restocking fees be calculated?
Should returns support exchange in addition to refund?

requirements.title: Reserved Inventory Management
requirements.description: System shall reserve inventory for active orders, release on cancellation, and display available versus reserved quantities.
followUpQuestions: How long should reservations be held before automatic release?
Should reservations support backorders?
How should reserved inventory for fraud review orders be handled differently?

edges.note: Need clarification on reserved vs available calculations for real-time availability.
Special inventory reservation handling needed for fraud review status.

requirements.title: Demand Forecasting and Automated Replenishment
requirements.description: System shall forecast demand based on sales velocity, lead time, safety stock, and economic order quantity calculations to drive automated replenishment.
followUpQuestions: What historical period should inform forecasting?
How should seasonality be factored into forecasts?
What approval workflow is needed for replenishment orders?

requirements.title: Cycle Counting with ABC Analysis
requirements.description: System shall support cycle counting with ABC classification, mobile counting app, blind counts, and variance resolution workflow.
followUpQuestions: What criteria define ABC classification?
How frequently should each class be counted?
What variance thresholds trigger investigation?

requirements.title: POS Offline Mode
requirements.description: System shall allow point-of-sale transactions to continue during network connectivity issues with automatic sync upon reconnection.
followUpQuestions: What data must be cached locally for offline operation?
How should payment processing work offline?
What conflict resolution is needed for inventory when syncing?

edges.note: Duplicate of REQ-014. Consider consolidating these requirements.

requirements.title: AR-based Virtual Try-on
requirements.description: System shall provide augmented reality virtual try-on with face detection, real-time overlay, photo capture, and social sharing capabilities.
followUpQuestions: What AR platform or SDK should be integrated?
What device/browser compatibility is required?
Should try-on sessions be stored or tracked?

edges.note: Duplicate of REQ-015. Consider consolidating these requirements.

requirements.title: Shopping Cart Persistence and Abandonment Recovery
requirements.description: System shall persist shopping carts for 30 days and send abandonment recovery emails at 24 hours and 3 days.
followUpQuestions: Should cart recovery emails include discount incentives?
How should inventory availability be handled for aged carts?
Should carts sync across devices for logged-in users?

requirements.title: Express Checkout with Tokenized Payment
requirements.description: System shall support express checkout with saved addresses, PCI-compliant tokenized payment methods, and checkout completion under 2 minutes.
followUpQuestions: What payment methods should be supported?
Should guest checkout be available or login required?
How should address validation be performed?

requirements.title: Product Review System with Moderation
requirements.description: System shall support product reviews with 5-star ratings, photo uploads, verified purchase badges, and automated profanity filtering.
followUpQuestions: Should reviews be moderated pre-publication or post-publication?
How should review helpfulness voting work?
Should reviews sync to product catalog in real-time?

requirements.title: Fixed Asset Management by Location
requirements.description: System shall track fixed assets including store fixtures and equipment by location, with depreciation tracking, transfer management, and maintenance scheduling.
followUpQuestions: What depreciation methods are required?
Should maintenance scheduling integrate with work order system?
What level of detail is needed for asset tagging and identification?

requirements.title: Flexible Promotion Engine with Stacking Rules
requirements.description: System shall support multiple promotion types, customer segmentation, usage limits, and configurable stacking control.
followUpQuestions: What specific stacking rules are needed?
How should promotion priority be determined?
Should promotions be channel-specific?

edges.note: This requirement expands on the flexible promotional engine from REQ-016.

requirements.title: Email Marketing with Segmentation and A/B Testing
requirements.description: System shall support email marketing campaigns with template editor, audience segmentation, triggered campaigns, and A/B testing analytics.
followUpQuestions: What email service provider will be integrated?
What customer data should be available for segmentation?
What metrics should be tracked for campaign performance?

requirements.title: E-commerce Fraud Detection System (Native)
requirements.description: System shall implement native fraud detection to reduce fraudulent losses by 90% and eliminate third-party fraud detection costs ($10,000 annually). Stripe does NOT provide fraud signals, requiring custom NetSuite solution.
followUpQuestions: What specific fraud signals will replace third-party detection (velocity checks, address verification, device fingerprinting)?
What is the target false positive rate?
Should machine learning models be incorporated for fraud scoring?

edges.note: This is the detailed native fraud detection solution that fulfills REQ-037.
Requires custom inventory reservation for fraud review orders.
Requires fraud reviewer role for manual review workflow.

requirements.title: Custom Inventory Reservation for Fraud Review Orders
requirements.description: System shall implement custom inventory reservation pattern for orders in fraud review status, separate from standard unapproved/approved order flow.
followUpQuestions: How long can orders remain in fraud review before inventory is released?
Should reserved inventory for fraud review be visible to customers checking availability?
What happens to inventory reservations if fraud review exceeds the time limit?

edges.note: Enables fraud detection system to hold inventory during review.
Extends reserved inventory management with fraud review status.

requirements.title: Fraud Reviewer Custom Role
requirements.description: System shall provide custom NetSuite role for fraud review staff with appropriate permissions to review flagged orders and approve/reject transactions.
followUpQuestions: What approval workflow is needed for fraud reviewer role provisioning?
Should fraud reviewers have access to customer PII or limited view?
What audit trail is required for fraud review decisions?

edges.note: Enables fraud detection system with manual review capability.

requirements.title: Sales Tax Nexus in All 50 US States
requirements.description: System shall calculate and collect sales tax for all 50 US states. HST for Canada is not currently required.
followUpQuestions: Will a tax calculation service (Avalara, TaxJar) be used or native NetSuite tax engine?
What is the process for maintaining nexus registration and rate updates?
Are there specific product tax categories or exemptions?

requirements.title: 5-Business-Day Month-End Close Timeline
requirements.description: System shall support month-end close process completion within 5 business days through automated processes and workflows.
followUpQuestions: What specific close tasks must be automated to achieve 5-day target?
What are the current manual bottlenecks in month-end close?
What close checklist and task tracking is needed?

requirements.title: Journal Entry Approval Workflow
requirements.description: System shall require CFO approval for journal entries exceeding $5,000.
followUpQuestions: Should approval be required before posting or can entries post pending approval?
Are there different approval thresholds by department or GL account?
What delegation process is needed when CFO is unavailable?

requirements.title: Store-level P&L Reporting
requirements.description: System shall provide profit and loss reporting at the store level using Class dimension as the primary performance view.
followUpQuestions: How should shared costs be allocated to stores?
What drill-down detail is needed below store level?
Should store P&L be available in real-time or monthly?

requirements.title: Payment Processor Settlement Reconciliation
requirements.description: System shall reconcile Stripe and PayPal settlements with proper tracking of processor fees and settlement timing.
followUpQuestions: Should reconciliation be automated or manual?
How should chargebacks and refunds be handled in reconciliation?
What is the acceptable variance threshold before investigation?

requirements.title: Multi-currency Support for Vendors
requirements.description: System shall support multi-currency vendor transactions for international vendors in China, Italy, and other countries.
followUpQuestions: What currencies are in scope?
How should foreign exchange gains/losses be recorded?
Is currency hedging required?

requirements.title: Deferred Revenue Management
requirements.description: System shall manage deferred revenue for gift cards, loyalty points, and extended warranties with appropriate recognition timing.
followUpQuestions: What revenue recognition rules apply to each deferred revenue type?
How should breakage/escheatment be estimated and recorded?
What reporting is needed for deferred revenue balances?

requirements.title: Expense Accruals Automation
requirements.description: System shall automate expense accruals for utilities, rent, marketing, and commissions to streamline month-end close.
followUpQuestions: What accrual calculation methods should be used for each expense type?
Should accruals be automatically reversed in the following period?
What approval or review is needed for accrual entries?
